requirement_designation: Science, Nature and Technology with Lab
course_description: Special theory of relativity, wave and particle properties of electromagnetic radiation and matter, introduction to quantum mechanics, Schrodinger equation, atomic models, and simple molecules. Four hours of lecture and one three-hour laboratory per week.
sections:
